Hi Noah,

> API-wise it's simpler and more restful to use http PUT. The curl option 
> is -T:
> 
> curl -Tmy-crawler-beans.cxml [other curl options...] 
> https://localhost:8443/engine/job/myjob/jobdir/crawler-beans.cxml
thanks for the update and updating the wiki! Will test this tomorrow and
send a quick note!

Daniel
